name: Lurking Sea
description:
In this game you are a little fish who is swimming deeper and deeper into the ocean. But watch out! There will be bigger fish trying to eat you! The further you go down, the more fish there is, and more species.

You use the W, A, S, D or the ARROW keys to move. Eat gold fish for points.

This game was made for the 48th Ludum Dare game jam. It was really fun to make and i also had some help by a friend who made the music for the game. Add him on discord: ZETA#7601
